name: Chimes Aviation Academy
about: Chimes Aviation Academy (CAA) is India's leading Flying Training Organisation, committed to providing the best flying training in South Asia. Approved by the Directorate General of Civil Aviation (DGCA) and allied with renowned airlines, CAA offers ab initio pilot training with a modern fleet of 24 aircraft and state-of-the-art facilities across three airbases in Madhya Pradesh. With a strong alumni presence and a direct pathway to the IndiGo cockpit, CAA prioritizes safety and regulatory excellence. Operating for over 15 years, CAA provides a comprehensive curriculum, industry-recognized programs, and a supportive community for aspiring aviators. Choose CAA for a career that takes you to new heights.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating"]
